thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: Ok, I have had the opportunity to buy several pieces from Jomashop.com recently and the service was consistently staggering. I can really see very little difference between Jomashop.com and a very real bricks and mortar jeweler specializing in high quality watches and merchandise. staff were courteous and helpful when i had questions. they provided me with blazing delivery speeds, and authentic watches from luxury manufacturers. I frankly don't know how they do it but they do it really well ! I got amazing discounts on all products i bought from them. I will undoubtedly be buying from them again as I have my eye on the omega sea-master. I check many discount online jewelers and Jomashop.com consistently beats the lowest prices I can find. I will never buy from a traditional retailer again thanks to these people, they have ruined me for life !!!
